item.description:
A CONTEMPORARY INTERPRETATION
of the
CLASSIC CHRISTMAS CELEBRATION
Sunday, December 23rd, 2012 * 4:00pm
Rogers Center for the Arts at Merrim ack College
Routes 114/125, North Andov er, Massachusetts

hi ladies! my friend is in this and i will need to let her know by thursday at 7pm if I want to reserve a few tickets...they are $20 each. i went last year and it is wonderful. it is last minute, but i am going and wanted to see if anyone is interested in meeting up . if i get a response, i need to be pretty sure of a head count before i reserve the number. i think we can pay at the door. we should arrive no later than 3:30 we could do a light dinner afterwards...thanks!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Christmas concert at merrimack college, andover
